sourcesContent:
<!-- TODO: change the height to 260px; -->
<ag-grid-angular
    style="width: 100%; height: 100%;; font-size: 12px; box-sizing: border-box;"
    class="ag-theme-alpine"
    [rowData]="data$ | async"
    [columnDefs]="colDef$ | async"
    [defaultColDef]="defaultColDef"
    [pagination]="true"
    [paginationPageSize]="5"
    [suppressDragLeaveHidesColumns]="true"
    [rowSelection]='rowSelection'
    (gridReady)="onGridReady($event)"
    >
</ag-grid-angular>
<!-- <button (click)="showPagination()">button
</button> -->
